value.string:
Command: IF-Else -> Web Control
Tag Name: IF-Else_WebControl

Usecase 1: Else If Web Control Exists Condition on Simple TextBox Control
Select Command : Web Control Exists
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/OC-HTML_Textbox.html
Control Details : Type : Text Box | Name : username | Value : 
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Id : username | Control Index : 0
Please enter the conditional commands here.

Usecase 2: Else If Web Control Exists Condition on Password TextBox Control
Select Command : Web Control Exists
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/OC-HTML_Textbox.html
Control Details : Type : Password Box | Name : password | Value : 
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Name : password | Control Id : pass | Control Index : 1
Please enter the conditional commands here.

Usecase 3: Else If Web Control Does Not Exist Condition on Simple TextBox Control
Select Command : Web Control Does Not Exist
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/OC-HTML_Textbox.html
Control Details : Type : Text Box | Name : username | Value : 
Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Id : username | Control Index : 0

Select Command : Web Control Does Not Exist
Specify Website URL/Page : Open New URL : http://ec2-34-217-153-232.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8001/client/OC-HTML_Textbox.html

Wait for the control to exist(in seconds) : 2
Search the control in a page by : Control Name : password | Control Id : pass | Control Index : 1
